comments:
We get the following exception loading snippets view (depends on palette) 
from of M7 based WSWB build. 
It goes away once 
<import plugin="org.eclipse.core.runtime.compatibility"/>
is added as a pre-req. 

[It seems GEF needs a 3.0 version added to bugzilla site!?]


===== top of stack only =====

We made this change a few weeks ago, so we just need to change the wswb3.txt 
file to use newer GEF builds.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 51563 ***
